Class Trade

java.lang.Object
Trade
All Implemented Interfaces:
Asset_inter, java.io.Externalizable, java.io.Serializable
public class Trade
extends java.lang.Object
implements Asset_inter
Trade class is used to store the important information about each trade within the database with the asset type, cost, org, amount all being saved here to allow it to interface with the client
See Also:

    • Trade

      public Trade​(int id, java.lang.String AssetName, int Amount, double Price, int Type, java.lang.String org_name, int Org, java.lang.String AssetDes, java.util.Date date, int assetid)
      Parameters:
      id - int, trade id
      AssetName - string, name of the asset being traded
      Amount - int, ammount of the asset being traded
      Price - double, cost of each individual asset being traded
      Type - int, tpye of trade 1 for buy 2 for sell
      org_name - string, name of the org selling the asset
      Org - int, id of the org selling the asset
      AssetDes - string, description of the asset being sold
      date - date, data that the trade was posted
      assetid - int, id of the asset that is being traded

      public pack place_offer​(int offer_org, int amount)
      creates a corresponding buy or sell offer based off this trade
      Parameters:
      offer_org - int, org that is making the corresponding offer
      amount - int, amount to buy from this trade
      Returns:
      pack object, a packed sell or but command to send to the server
